DOC.criteria: 1. type 2 diabetes 2. 21 75 year age 3. male nonpregnant , nonlactating female , least 6 week postpartum postmenopausal surgically sterile 4 . BMI > 18.5 kg/m2 < 35 kg/m2 5 . HbA1c < 9.0 % 1 . Subject use exogenous insulin , exenatide , sitagliptin phosphate 2. type 1 diabetes . 3. history diabetic ketoacidosis . 4. current infection 5. active malignancy 6. significant cardiovascular event history congestive heart failure . 7. endstage organ failure post organ transplant . 8. history renal disease . 9. hepatic disease . 10. history gastrointestinal disorder 11. chronic , contagious , infectious disease , active tuberculosis , Hepatitis B C , HIV . 12. take herbal , dietary supplement , medication , oral hypoglycemic medication 13. clot bleeding disorder . 14. allergic intolerant ingredient find study product .
